QuestData.Title: The Beauty of Marketing
QuestData.Description:
While us Fizzbrackets may not be goblins, we still know a business opportunity when we see one! The resort staff is getting trained, the place is getting cleaned up, now all we need is some quality marketing!
<Wulferd holds up a familiar looking box.>
Behold! The wondrous Gnomish engineering feat that is the S.E.L.F.I.E. Camera! Now, if only there was a generous $r willing to capture the radiance of this place.
Make sure you look like you're enjoying yourself out there!
QuestData.LogDescription: Take S.E.L.F.I.E.s with the resort's sights and wildlife.
QuestData.CompletionText: If your smile isn't at least half of the picture, I don't want to see it!
QuestData.RewardText: These are perfect, you look dashing! Now I need to figure out how to get these out to our target customers.
